In Trench Warfare WWI your goal is to gain supremacy by capturing the enemy trenches and seeing your nations flag wave in the wind. name: Chess for Idiots

The game is played on the same board using the same pieces. However, this is where the similarities end, because everything that would discriminate intellectually against players was eliminated from the rules. Therefore, there are practically no rules, and players can make any move with any pieces and capture any number of opponent's pieces. The victory is determined by the IQ (the lower, the greater the chances of winning) and the decision of Ozjasz Goldberg.

description: Dirge: is a 4v1 survival horror where players take on the role of paranormal investigators in the post war era to hunt down and defeat dark entities haunting various tortured locations across the world. Or Stalk the interlopers as one of these dark entities, and expel them from your domain.

name: Hellcard
description: Hellcard is a cooperative roguelike deckbuilder with Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes. Descend into the paper dungeons on your own, recruit computer-controlled companions or join other gamers in fast-paced tactical card battles against the armies of darkness and the Archdemon himself!

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink
description: A grand adventure in the skies awaits! Form a party of four from a diverse roster of skyfarers and slash—or shoot or hex—your way to victory against treacherous foes in this action RPG. Take on quests solo or with the help of others in up to 4-player co-op play!

name: Kalpa of Sword
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Dead
description: Dive into a kilometer deep cave to find riches, lost technology and unnamed artifacts, but watch out, for "IT" slumbers in the forgotten depths. The game is a rogue-light slightly inspired by Spelunky where you have to reach the bottom to unlock upgrades, that is if the teeth in the dark will let you escape...

name: Booom-Slang!
description: Top-down, Twin-Stick Shooting, FMV-infused, low-poly, creep infested, plasma blasting, crazily competitive CHAOS!!! Booom-Slang! is stocked up with a cavalcade of insane Single-Player and Multiplayer modes, maps and moments. Are you ready for what Conductor Chaos has in store for you?!

name: Perfect Love
description: A horror-romance visual novel where you shape Milo Change, a student in one of the classes that you attend, into your desired, Perfect Love.

name: Neon Fantasy: Horses
description: Neon Fantasy: Horses is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Pawnchline
description:
Display your best stand-up comedy routines in the most famous bar in town, the "Pawnchline".

Use your joke cards to find the type of humor that best suits your audience, and make them laugh. But bear in mind, each session has its new outlandish audience, with different humor preferences.

name: The Darkside Detective Duology
description:
Grab your trench coat, tune your sixth sense and join the Darkside Division as they investigate the outright bizarre, the downright dangerous and the confusing cases of Twin Lakes. Flesh-hungry tentacles, mafian zombies, and the occasional missing sock are no match for The Darkside Detective.

- About The Darkside Detective

Where cultists crawl, where demons dwell, where the occult… occults? *ahem* That's where you’ll find Detective Francis McQueen, the lead investigator of the criminally underfunded Darkside Division. When evil darkens the doorsteps of Twin Lakes City – hell, even when it just loiters around shop fronts or hangs out in shady alleyways – he’s there, ready to investigate the cases that nobody else will.

- About The Darkside Detective: Fumble in the Dark

Twin Lakes is a cursed city. Less cursed than say, “Demons are tearing it apart” but more cursed than “always loses its keys” or “often steps in puddles”. It’s roughly in the middle of the cursed scale, is what we’re trying to say.

Cursed enough that it’s a nuisance. Cursed enough that somebody has to deal with it…

That’s where The Darkside Detective comes in. Whenever you hear a bump in the night, feel a tingle up your spine, or smell something fishy, Detective Francis McQueen isn’t far behind. No, he doesn’t smell of fish - it’s a phrase, come on...

description: Sin descripción

description: A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom is a 2D game where you face random horrors. Get keys from foes and upgrade your gear. Find new levels, enemies, items, and terrain. Survive as long as you can in this nightmare.

Block Hopper is a 2D platforming game made with low poly 3D assets. The game comes with Four game modes and more bonus levels and content to come in the future and each differs in small ways and large ways.
Block Hopper is a game you can enjoy at your own pace or if you want a bit of a challenge you can play Hardcore Mode which restarts you if you aren't fast enough.

name: Big Watermelon Match

name: Miniland Adventure
description: Miniland Adventure is a game where you can do anything you want to!

description: Can you beat the high scores?

name: Fragmented Leaves: Before the Storm
description: The two former enemies gathered together because of the same enemy. Their task is to prevent the outbreak of a war. However, their efforts were destined to be in vain, and all of this was just a prelude to the outbreak of the great war.

name: The Yanus Plan for Escape from the Void
description: "The Yanus Plan for Escape from the Void" is a first person perspective escape room game where you lose your memory and don't know where you are. You have to keep moving forward and explore the truth.

name: Genshin Impact: Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze
description:
Version 4.4 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Xianyun and Gaming
• New area: Chenyu Vale
• New story quest for Xianyun
• New outfits for Xingqiu, Ganyu and Shenhe
• New main event: Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Eternum Dreamland
description: This is a third-person beautiful girl fighting zombie game. Elements such as shooting, changing clothes, and shelters are included. The heroine is a high school student in the countryside, in a constant cycle, looking for her former friends alone, and taking refuge in a small villa.

name: Catty Cathy
description: This is the story of Cathy. She is very catty and always wants to look pretty, but she always says mean things. When she walks she poops and it may turn to gold. She needs the gold to buy fillers for her face to look pretty.

name: BMX Gravel
description: Ready to tear up gravel, get big air and pump out the tricks BMX-style? Easy to learn, but hard to master. Hone your skills and chalk up bigger and bigger numbers the harder and faster you go. So put your pedal to the metal and vie for title of ultimate BMX gravel master!

name: Beast Park
description: This is a bullet screen shooting role-playing game, where players can freely match their decks and have a thrilling battle!

name: Clean Up After Your Dog
description: This parody casual clicker RPG is about picking up your dog ploppy's in different locations.

name: Separated Worlds
description: Go to the dungeons and find out where it leads. On the way you will meet a lot of creatures from different worlds. Maybe we should find out where they came from?

name: God of Stickfights
description: God of Stickfights is a rogue-like, multiplayer stickman game and extreme overpowered real-time fighter. Have fun and outsmart your opponents. Selection by Selection. Be a God and destroy everything in your path. Evolve during battles and feel like in a stickman animation.

name: Tidal Therapy
description: Tidal Therapy is a travel novel game for tired adults. A tired office worker heads to the sea. The setting is a quiet and beautiful sea town with a seaside park, warehouse district, and tower condominiums.

name: Trois Mouvements Perpétuels
description: Three games about music. One alone is light, short and weak, but the three allow you to enjoy the consistency of ideas.

name: Space Rock Armageddon
description: Space Rock Armageddon is a bold and dynamic space arcade game, boasting lightning-fast gameplay and an explosion of vibrant colors that make it feel like an eighties arcade classic.

name: Galactic Breakout
description: Return to the classic with Galactic Breakout! This space-themed Arkanoid game challenges players to destroy diverse blocks to conquer each level. Unleash the power of 10 unique upgrades while dodging 10 debuffs. Overcome 75 thoroughly created levels and achieve the max game score

name: 3DC
description: 3DC is a graphic adventure that teaches children from 8 to 12 years old what depression is.

name: Tulip
description: You are a very sad bunny. You cannot stop crying. You might have to drink something gross. You are Tulip. Wander through a storybook countryside, gather ingredients for a strange brew, and get to know your adorable animal neighbors in an odd quest to alleviate your incurable sadness.

name: Eastward: Octopia!
description: Sam and John return in an all-new adventure! In this heartwarming story-driven farming sim, players can grow crops, tend livestock, and turn an abandoned fairground into a thriving village, with the help of the weird and wonderful cast of beloved Eastward characters.

name: Exodus
description: Save Moses' girlfriend from the clutches of the prince of Egypt, Ramses, in this thrilling adventure across the Egyptian desert. Face enemies and bosses, find items and power-ups scattered throughout a fantastic 2D open world full of challenges, secrets and much more!

name: Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom
description: Get ready for a hilariously outrageous multiplayer FPS experience that combines the meme world of the Skibidi toilet with intense action-packed battles! In "Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom" you'll dive headfirst into a quirky universe where two bizarre factions clash for supremacy: the eccentric Cameraheads and the wacky Skibidi Toilets.

name: Dominoes Colors
description: Dominoes Colors It is a puzzle relaxing game where you need to mix colors when put each piece on board. The mix result is the next step to solve the puzzle. The piece with a chequered flag is the last piece, your last mix of colors needs to be equal of it.

name: Gates of the Mind
description: Gates of the Mind - is a 2D Hardcore platformer. Game should search you in reaction and ingenuity in boss fights and locations.Each Boss fight and Location have a phases where you must be accurate in your actions and contains non-linear solutions for opening gates of mind.

name: Waifu Club: Ayame
description: Waifu Club is the perfect Waifu puzzle game. Enjoy Ayame in 6 images in the gallery after you unlocked them in the game. The Gallery itself is easy controllable.

name: AI Arena
description: AI Arena is a groundbreaking game that combines human and AI collaboration. Through a process called Imitation Learning, players transfer their skills to an AI, which then competes on their behalf. With a neural network embedded in their character, players can continuously improve their AI's skills. AI Arena is skill-based and offers limitless potential for AI development and competitive eSports. It aims to make AI more accessible, approachable, and foster AI literacy among the general public.

name: Ex Vitro
description: Ex Vitro is a dark sci-fi 2D platformer where you delve into the ruins of a military research facility and discover the horrors within. Whether machine, creature, or something else entirely, you’ll face the violent legacy of the last survivors of humanity.

name: Fitting-In
description: Fitting-In is a single player puzzle game where you perform movement combos to jump over, through, and inside obstacles! There are walls, pause blocks, break blocks, and move blocks that all require creativity to overcome!

name: Love n Life: Lucky Teacher
description: After the pandemic Covitch69, you lost your job as a space aviation expert and now become a teacher in a small town. Luckily, every cloud has a silver lining as you are stepping into a world where love blooms unexpectedly and leads you to captivating ladies with immersive romantic tales.

name: A Good Place To Die
description: Kill as many zombies as possible, collect points by hitting them, upgrade your weapons and reach the final boss!

name: The Forgotten Tapes: Twisted Forms
description: The second collection in the widely received "Forgotten Tapes" series, where we explore the theme of "Body Horror" with 8 unique games from different developers. Explore a morgue after hours & experiment on 8 poor souls who have lost their way. Can you make it through the night?

name: Christmas Squirt!
description: Christmas Squirt! - is an awesome, animated, relaxing game where sexy elf girls help you have an unforgettable Christmas night. See if you can bring the lusty girls to squirt!

name: SnowRunner: Season 12 - Public Energy
description: Season 12: Public Energy is included in the Year 3 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run. North Carolina's state government needs you to assist in the establishment of a nuclear power station and to help local farmers cultivate their crops.

name: Silent Hill: The Short Message
description: Silent Hill: The Short Message is a free-to-play Silent Hill spin-off set in modern-day Germany. Players explore a location known as The Villa from a first-person perspective.

name: Glory's Fools
description: A retro RPG set in the mythic Age of Greece. Find allies, choose your path to glory, fighting monsters, men, or even Gods and become a true hero!

name: Murders on the Yangtze River
description: "Murders on the Yangtze River" is a horizontal axis Chinese-style whodunnit detective game developed by OMEGames Studio. Players will find out the hidden truths of the final case through investigating and reasoning a pile of fantastic cases.

name: Zenteni
description: Build, conquer and collect puzzles.

name: Shards of Chaos
description:
This Visual Novel tells the story of a dark journey in a broken world.

The action takes place in the abandoned estate of the former Order called “Black Rose”. One day this estate was swallowed up by the magical catastrophe which spread death to all nearby lands, turning people into “Shadows”.
You will have to plunge into this cursed place, where a mad & legendary adventurer, and a girl from the “Hel” clan are hiding in the darkness.

A non-linear plot that can change depending on your choices | A dramatic story, not a dating sim.

name: One Punch Man: World
description:
Get ready for "One Punch Man: World", an action game developed by T3 Studio, a subsidiary of Perfect World Games!
"One Punch Man: World" is a new action game with a perfect recreation of the anime. The world of One Punch Man is intricately expanded through the perspectives of various characters, all while staying true to the original anime's essence.

name: Corsairs Legacy
description: Corsairs Legacy is an open-world RPG pirate game in which you will immerse yourself in a perilous adventure. Solve the conflict in Barbados, being in the heart of intrigue, open up to new adventures and become a thunderstorm of the archipelago!

name: Forza Horizon 5: Chinese Lucky Stars Car Pack

The Chinese Lucky Stars Car Pack brings everything from SUVs to hot hatches with the 2022 Lynk & Co 05+, 2023 MG Cyberster, 2012 Volkswagen Santana and the 2022 Wuling Hongguang Mini EV

description: Sin descripción

name: Nebula Nomads
description: Embark on a spacefaring odyssey in Nebula Nomads! Pilot your cargo haulers through the cosmic expanse, mastering thrust vectoring as you deliver valuable packages between space stations. Earn credits, upgrade your fleet, and explore a captivating 2.5D universe. Launch into Nebula Nomads now!

description: Play as a young girl who was sent to an orphanage just a month ago to find the truth about the Halloween demon. The game is a role-playing turn-based RPG. Players need to collect as much candy as possible, talk to passersby as much as possible, and advance the plot.

description: Evelyn, once known as the sexiest woman on the silver screen, now a formidable TV producer. Her relentless interviews often reveal more than her guests anticipate. Off-screen, she delves into yoga, finding tranquility amidst chaos. Would you dare to join her for a yoga session?

name: Celebrities Hacked: LatexUsagi Photo Pack
description: When a charming bunny hops your way out of a passion for cosplay, you can't help but take notice. Her athletic grace, cloaked in a daring outfit, radiates an allure that's both playful and tempting. Are you ready to surrender to her captivating charm, and perhaps even score her number?

name: Celebrities Hacked: PlushyPixel Photo Pack
description: The pink-haired internet sensation, bridges the world of anime and gaming. This geek goddess adores plushy toys and cherishes every chat with her followers. Though shy, she's on a bold journey to break free from her cocoon. Ready to join her adventure?

name: Celebrities Hacked: NoirPetal Photo Pack
description: NoirPetal, a successful fashion house owner and perfume creator, has become an inspirational figure for millions. From a determined child with a chemistry set, she's built a fashion empire, with styles seamlessly merging classic and modern trends.

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Earth's Legacy M.A.I.A

name: JR East Train Simulator: Koumi Line (Kobuchizawa to Komoro) Kiha E200 series
description: The Koumi Line is a 78,9 km long line connecting Kobuchizawa Station in Hokuto City, Yamanashi Prefecture and Komoro Station in Komoro City, Nagano Prefecture. The greatest feature of the Koumi Line is that it runs at high elevation.

name: Unsolved Case: Killer Popularity DLC
description: Every reckless decision can turn into a perfectly planned crime. Criminals have discovered tons of innovative ways to keep a low profile. Your move, Detective!

name: Ghost legend

name: Nono's Quest
description: Nono's Quest is a short casual 2D JRPG were you fight monsters and get in all types of trouble.

name: Pixel Puzzles Trivia
description: Pixel Puzzles Trivia is an informative question questing puzzle game.

description: Place the rocks, make a solid line, make the line crumble and fall! There are an infinite amount of strategies! Made by 1 person, inspired by a fake mobile game ad. Enjoy!

name: Golf with Guns
description: Mini golf with a twist... GUNS! Shoot your own golf ball to move it closer to the hole or shoot an opponent's ball to mess them up. Compete with friends and/or randoms to shoot the lowest score. Enjoy playing your own custom maps or ones made by the community on the Workshop.

name: Mysterious prophecy
description: This is a parkour game that is not just about running, but about climbing, jumping, and crossing all obstacles, constantly running forward.

name: FawnRun
description: The only level 2D casual mini-game there is please keep moving.

name: Eye of death
description: This is a parkour game.

name: Moyu world
description: This is an exciting game with very simple rules and high degrees of freedom.

name: Teletext
description: Welcome back to 1995. You turn your TV on, but there's an ad break! You press the red button to check out your favorite passtime. As you browse through, you see there's a lot missing. News articles not displaying, games out of order. Is anyone even keeping this updated anymore? Where did they go?

name: I Think You Should Marble
description: I think You Should Marble is collection of 10 Marble Themed maps with different color combinations and themes.

name: The Fortress of Doom
description: A vanilla Quake map set in an early medieval structure, the final stronghold of the forces of evil here on Earth.

name: Balls of Steel
description: The Balls are Back! The legendary 90s pinball game Balls of Steel returns to PC in all of its radical retro glory. Play through 5 classic top-down pinball tables: Darkside, Barbarian, Firestorm, Mutation, and Devil's Island. Not only that, we've added two BRAND NEW tables in classic BoS Style: Centipede, and Missile Command! Get 7 awesome retro tables in one package!

name: Minecraft: Godzilla
description: It’s time to meet the king of monsters in the new Godzilla adventure world by Team-KYO and Impress. Select the Godzilla film you fancy best and engage in city-smashing fun. Play your way by escaping Godzilla’s wrath or even destroying the city as the blocky beast itself.

name: Cave of Illusions: Twistyland
description: A surreal, atmospheric and vivid horror game about a mysterious board game and the little Sophie trapped inside it.

name: Dead by Daylight: Alan Wake Chapter
description: From one Dark Place to another. Dead by Daylight: Alan Wake brings bestselling author Alan Wake into The Fog. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive universal Charm: Nail Gun.

name: Sphere Game Colours
description: The Sphere Game is about to enchant its loyal fans and win over new enthusiasts. With a complete revitalization, the game offers a completely renewed experience, standing out for stunning visuals and innovative mechanics. Overcome challenging obstacles and dive into an exciting journey, where each stage presents new and thrilling challenges. Your mission is clear: cross the portal to advance to the next level, facing a series of intriguing challenges along the way. Be prepared for an engaging experience where triumph is rewarded, and excitement is always on the horizon.

name: Sertorgina
description: Welcome to explore the unknown world with Sertorgina together. You will face various enemies, from ordinary soldiers to powerful boss.

name: Psychopomp
description:
Welcome to the world of Psychopomp.
There are catacombs hidden under every building in the world.
Everyone knew about them, but lied to you about them your entire life.

Descend into the depths, and see what awaits below.

Psychopomp is a short Psychological Horror Dungeon Crawler.
Something is wrong with the world, everything is not as you remember.
You don't know why, but everything draws you to the Earth, to the tunnels below. Do the answers await you there, or is something far worse in store?

name: Adorimon: Arena of Ancients
description: Explore fantastic creatures called "Adorimon" in a new 2D turn-based strategy game! Collect and train your Adorimons to discover the world, climb Challenge Tower, and duel other players in Arena.

name: Halo Infinite: CU29
description:
Content Update 29 (“CU29”) brings a new Arena map, a Covenant object palette and new Forge features, a new armor core and customization rewards, and the first of three free Operations—starting with the Halo Wars-themed “Spirit of Fire.” This operation will be followed up by "Cyber Showdown III" and "The Yappening II" operations. Playlist refreshes will also launch during CU29, including new map additions to the Big Team Battle, Firefight King of the Hill, and Squad Battle playlists.

CU29 will be the first of many future planned updates that will replace the current "season" model, electing instead to provide smaller content drops but at more frequent intervals.

name: Teppo and The Secret Ancient City
description: "Teppo and The Secret Ancient City" is an exciting adventure where players take on the role of explorer Teppo, searching for the legendary stone fortress hidden in the Amazon jungle. Meeting the mysterious Tanaca Wanax, the last chief of the unknown tribe of elected allies, Ugha Lulala, players will discover the incredible and fantastic history of a highly evolved ancient civilization, superior to that of the Mayas and the Incas. With the help of unknown technologies from space visitors, including magical diamond-shaped stones that can open a portal to access parallel worlds, players will have to overcome obstacles and challenges to reach the fortress and open the first portal. A mystery and discovery filled adventure for fans of exploration and archaeology.

name: Deepest Regret
description: A 3D action RPG featuring swordplay and magic battles.

name: Binary Dungeon
description: Card-based roguelike dungeon crawler

name: SCP: Rulebreaker
description: Dive into the heart of horror with this survival game inspired by the mysterious SCP Foundation. After the opening of Site 1730, once the stronghold of the Foundation, chaos has erupted. All sites, except Sites 15 and 19, have been abandoned, converging towards Complex 1730. An unprecedented concentration of anomalies released during a containment breach has left the complex in a state of desolation. Step into the shoes of a Foundation guard, facing the ultimate survival challenge as the horrors of anomalies threaten to engulf everything.

name: Mothman
description: A 1-4 player CO-OP horror game, a nightmare from hell, it is your objective to hunt down a sinister demon known as Mothman. Underequipped you must search the landscape for resources. Lay bear traps, stalk from a distance, and stay quiet. You came to hunt, only to be hunted.

name: Dark is the Void
description: Dark is the Void is a combat focused JRPG-inspired roguelike, featuring fast paced, menu-driven battles. Build, customize, and optimize your party of four from a mix of 24 unique classes, spanning a range from Tanks, Healers, DPS, and every hybrid in between.

name: AstroPanic
description: AstroPanic is a top-down rogue-like 2D space game. Upgrade your ship by battling aliens, progress to new levels with the points you earn, and get ready for an exciting space adventure!

name: Gearhead Karting: Mechanic & Racing
description: The ultimate kart racing game with deep customization, realistic physics, and a variety of game modes. Build, tune, and race your way to victory!

name: Infected: Super Soldier Project
description: A police officer goes to investigate an old house where he hears reports of noises and screams, a team was sent before him and they didn't give any feedback, something macabre awaits this police officer.

name: Rush Commander
description: Rush Commander is a direct action strategy game with one simple order, MOVE!You take the role of a commander in the World War II theater, and you must ensure to survive. Move your company, improve it, and request reinforcements to win!

name: Celebrities Hacked: KittyLock Photo Pack
description: KittyLock, adorned with signature kitten ears, exudes originality. Known for her dynamic stage performances, she is a sensation in sensual gymnastics. Overcoming a tough past through online visibility, she is loved for her unique style. Ready to be mesmerized by her performance?

name: Celebrities Hacked: Penelope Photo Pack
description: Step into the intriguing world of Penelope, a fascinating blend of modest charm and astute brilliance. Nestled within the vibrant hum of a hotel bar, she silently whispers a tale waiting to be discovered. Eager for an exhilarating adventure? Let's unravel her mystery together!

name: Celebrities Hacked: Scarlet Photo Pack
description: Dazzling starlet, known for her fiery red hair and elegance. With a fondness for pink, she enjoys the luxuries, only donning faux fur, highlighting her caring heart. Ready to be captivated by her allure?

name: Hex Racer
description: Race through the asteroid belt, hit checkpoints to increase your score, Use power ups to help you. Game Modes - Monthly event with leaderboard - Endless/practice - Split Screen - Story mode

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 3 - Deep Sleep
description: A decrepit orphanage known as Playcare sits beneath the once magical toy factory. You must make your way through this haunted place, solving new puzzles and avoiding the nightmares that lurk within the dark. Answers lie between the blood-stained bedsheets and screaming echoes... If you can survive.

name: Time Drive: Racing Destiny
description: Hentai of Multiverse – there are a lot of girls waiting for you in this universe who are ready to go to great lengths, if of course you have a good memory and you can find the same cards for them!

name: The Pair Annihilation
description: The Pair Annihilation is a grid-based and turn-based strategy game that depicts a war to protect the human race. It features multiple battlefields, different ship combinations, and various relics.

name: Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League - Deluxe Edition
description:
Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is an action-adventure shooter developed by Rocksteady Studios. Set in Metropolis, players control Harley Quinn, Deadshot, Captain Boomerang, and King Shark as they battle a brainwashed Justice League under Brainiac's control. The game features third-person combat, open-world exploration, and live-service elements. It received mixed reviews for its narrative and repetitive gameplay mechanics.

Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League - Deluxe Edition features:

- All Standard Edition content and pre-order bonuses.
- Four Justice League Outfits, one for each Squad member.
- Three Black Mask-themed notorious weapons (pistol, sniper rifle, and heavy weapon).
- Four Squad Golds-themed weapon dolls, one for each Squad member.
- One premium battle pass token.
- Up to 72-hour early access to the game, prior to the main launch.

name: Idle Devils
description: Idle Devils is a leisure strategic placement game. In addition to rich roles, skills and equipment systems, you can also freely choose the devil to cultivate. Through her, you can conquer new female demons, and finally complete the salvation of the Demon World, becoming a real Demon King.

name: Long Steel
description: 20 years after the defeat of the Shaper of Magic, Warlock, the island of Melas is in a time of peace. But when the dark cult known as the Wicken return to resurrect Warlock from his ashes, you must spring into action to stop them before the apocalypse is set into motion.

name: No Reloading: Survival Trials
description: Infinite destruction in infinite combinations! No Reloading: Survival Trials is a third-person rogue-lite style shooter taking inspiration from classics like Max Payne. Slay simulants, earn upgrades, and look cool while doing it!

name: Mage Rumble
description: Battle by yourself or with friends against the computer and other players in this turn-based combat game! Learn new spells after each round (if you can afford them) to add to your arsenal. Choose your game mode, customize your preferences and may the best mage win!

name: Ancient Souls Tamag
description: Help Erlik Khan to get out of Tamag. Defeat your enemies, solve puzzles and overcome challenging obstacles. Prince of Souls-Like kind a game.

name: Paradaice
description: PARADAICE is a brutal car combat game in which strategy, fury and behind-the-wheel skill will be essential to eliminate all your enemies. Explore the maps, equip yourself and let the hunt begin! Join the battle with your friends and make them bite the dust (or the road)...

name: Grim Clicker
description: Grim Clicker is an IDLE/RPG clicker where you will find your own strategy to explore the lost worlds. Inspired by games such as Diablo, Grim Dawn, Dark Souls, etc., the game features a complex character development, many unique items, active and passive playstyle.

name: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijoushugi no Kyoushitu he: Merge Puzzle Tokubetsu Shiken
description:
Experience the story of the "Yomi" anime with the easy-to-use and addictive "Merge Puzzle"!
There are no difficult operations to advance the game! Combine various objects and clear the mission!
The side scenario also features a behind-the-scenes story that is not depicted in the anime!

name: In The Shadows
description: Embark on a short yet captivating journey in "In The Shadows". Player must manipulate abstract objects, harnessing the power of light and shadow, to cast silhouettes that form familiar shapes and objects.

name: Tomb of the Brain
description: Sin descripción

name: Trust Me
description: Guide the twin cats to their childhood friend Mii-chan. A two-player cooperative game created in PICO-8.

name: Endless Dungeon: Ichiban And Kiryu Skin Pack
description: Celebrate the release of the game Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth with this free Skin Pack! The pack includes: - 1 Comrade Ichiban Kasuga Skin - 1 Fassie Kazuma Kiryu Skin See you soon in the Station!

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross - Shining Stars
description: Shining Stars: A free world mode that combines vast map exploration, city-building development, and guild upgrades. Venture into various realms to write a new chapter of history!

name: Off-Road: Redneck Racing - Off-Road
description: Off-Road allows the player to race high performance buggies and sand rails across six stunning locations. Slide, jump, skid and wheel spin around circuits specifically designed to offer maximum thrills and spills.

name: Ludicrous Leap
description: Fast-Paced, Level-Based 3D Platformer - Jump, Dodge, Climb, and Run! Try to beat the Bronze, Silver, and Gold times for each level (if you can even beat the levels at all)!

name: Lone Lamp
description: A point-and-click puzzle adventure

name: GuluGuluLand 3D
description: A classic action-style, 3D game from the NES era! Unity-chan keeps running and can't stop. Use the actions of grabbing the stick with one hand to turn, and grabbing the stick with both hands to jump, and lead her to clear the stage.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: WWE DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: WWE

name: MR 333 II: Planetbirth
description: Fight back entities and run from those they persuade as you seal the portal before MR 333 is given access to the world of your home.

name: Rock Climbing?
description: It's a difficult game but it should be easier than real rock climbing.

name: Chipichapas Evolution: Clicker
description: Collect as many Chipichapas as possible by clicking on the Chipichapa as fast as possible!

name: Time Machine Bronzeville
description: A storytelling game that explores the stories, cityscape, and legend and lore of Chicago's South Side ca. 1940. Encounter both heroes and scoundrels in 3D interactive scenes that transport the visitor into detailed recreations of this vanished community as it was between the World Wars.

name: Slime, Fire and Soul
description: You enter the DUNGEON and try to get as far as possible.

name: Kuudere Funk
description: With the city overrun with supernatural beings and occurrences, it is up to two women to restore the city to its former state. In order to accomplish such a task, sexual rituals must be performed by these women at the shrines scattered throughout the city…

name: Pripyat Block 1986
description: A VHS Found Footage Urbex Simulation horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned apartment building.

name: Five Nights At Shrek's Hotel 2
description:
This game is the second version of our older game 5 Nights At Shrek's Hotel.
You are just another regular customer, just like before...
You only have to stay 5 nights. you know it's going to be fine, it has always been.

name: Mountinuum
description: Sixth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Economia: Millennium
description: Dive into economic and strategic mastery with Aporia Interactive's innovative game, Economia: Millennium. Lead your nation as a visionary, navigating the complexities of the 21st-century world in this engaging real-time strategy and economic management experience. Will you lead your nation to unparalleled prosperity, or will you succumb to the challenges of the new millennium?

name: Figuras y Figuraciones
description: Join a rigorous study to find out what makes people laugh.

name: Floor Observer
description: You are being hired by the unknown company to observe the area of a different places with the special elevator. Your job is to observe the floor and make sure that everything is in place on each floor. If something is wrong, press the red button, if not, press the white button. Can you make it to floor 30 and survive this job?

name: Celeste 64: Fragments of the Mountain
description: Relive the magic of Celeste Mountain alongside Madeline in this small, heartfelt 3D platformer. Created in a week(ish) by the Celeste team to celebrate the game’s sixth anniversary.

name: Hard Hat: Rebuild
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Echoes
description: Take command of the mech and become the ultimate strategist. Construct impregnable defense facilities, handpick potent skills, lead your troops, and defy relentless enemy assaults. Will you emerge victorious in this thrilling battle for supremacy?

name: A Christmassy Christmas
description: "Beneath the festive cheer, Santa's wrath draws near. Naughty souls, tremble in fear, for judgment day is finally here." A Christmassy Christmas is an arena roguelike survival game where Santa disposes of naughty children.

name: Sora to Muku no 6-ki
description:
You are the commander and train 6 boys and girls as pilots of "Muku Airplane".
While building the deck, you use cards in your hand with various effects to teach the children the three statuses of "piloting," "shooting," and "support," as well as "special skills.

In this title, you select one of three countries to begin play.
Each country has its own play style and scenario, allowing for a variety of ways to play.

name: Always Surrender
description: Always Surrender is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up score attack, with an emphasis on pushing your luck as far as you can. Last as long as possible against an endless horde of enemies and then surrender in order to bank the bonus.

name: Supernatural Shenanigans
description: Supernatural Shenanigans is a 2-player online co-op game where you take on the role of a supernatural detective that investigates dark rituals. Get together with a friend, gather as much evidence as you can, solve puzzles, revert the magic, and most important: survive!

name: Project 13
description:
Welcome to Project 13, a unique Walking Simulator that challenges your perception and instincts in a dystopian world. In this immersive experience, you step into the shoes of a disposable Probant, devoid of rights and a future, tasked with navigating a mysterious, repeating Hospital Corridor.

Your objective is clear: report any anomalies encountered during your walks. The catch? A single mistake means starting anew. Only by consistently reporting accurately can you progress through the enigmatic corridors.

name: Table Tennis Toon!
description: Table Tennis Toon is a fast-paced table tennis game. Aim with complete freedom and fire the ball with five different types of shot! Choose your character and play solo or against your friends in thrilling and adrenalinic matches. Prevail and conquer the title of "Ping Pong Master"!

name: Dr. P
description: Dr. P was developed as part of a project to overcome panic disorder, and you can use VR to face and overcome various situations.

name: Black silk girl
description: It's a casual whack-a-mole like game with lots of pictures of girls, and when the block turns red, click on it. You can remove it, remove all the squares, you can see the girl's face.

name: Zarathustra: Cybergeddon
description:
Zarathustra - Cybergeddon is a classic point and click adventure with inventory and dialog puzzles in a scifi futuristic setting.
It's a rather casual experience with no dead-ends or overly difficult puzzles.

"In the aftermath of The Inflection, a momentous event that unveiled cosmic truths and alien technology, two religious factions emerge: the Church of Flesh, embracing chaos and free will, and the Church of Neon, upholding order and stability.

Amy, an FBI agent affiliated with the Church of Neon, carries with her a unique asset: a cybernetic implant housing the consciousness of a past individual—you, the player.

Together, you navigate the complexities of a case involving a book stolen from the Church of Flesh. This investigation is set against the backdrop of a world grappling with the implications of its newfound enlightenment and the delicate balance between these two divergent philosophies."

name: Enspell
description: “Enspell” is deck building-RogueLike game based on a medieval fantasy where you unravel secrets and explore to seek treasures. While you fight against monsters in dangerous dungeons, you can collect trophies and make your own deck.

name: Y. Village: The Visitors
description: Batu, tormented by nightmares, is lured to a nameless village via cryptic letters. Investigating the village's secrets with just one friend, he wakes one night to discover his ally gone. He must now locate his friend and elude the village's dark mysteries.

name: The Cauldron Kids: The Summoning of Mr. Vermicelli
description: The Cauldron Kids is a pixel art short narrative RPG about two kid witches on their way to magical mischief and plushie bewitching, combining quirky and sweet dialogues and minigames. Featuring the small and cozy chalet the characters live in, players discover soon that the Cauldron Kids’ home is full of magical and playful surprises.

name: Dealer Simulator
description: Dealer Simulator invites you to a world where your bargaining skills will be tested to the limits, and you'll never know what lies behind each door. Are you ready to become a top-tier trader? Join the warehouse adventure with Dealer Simulator!

name: JKEnterprises
description: Take command of a galactic megacorporation in this 3D RTS. Engage in planetary battles while managing systems under your control.

name: Realm of Dread
description: Take a step into the Realm of Dread's world of horror and suspense. Explore mysterious locations, fight for survival within the realm of supernatural entities and uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows. This journey through darkness requires courage and intellect. Are you ready?

name: Departed Away
description: Discover 'Departed Away,' a captivating visual novel where friendship intertwines with mystery. Uncover secrets, engage in verbal duels, and make choices that shape your story. Delve into emotional depth and intricate connections in this unique story.

name: The Symbiant Re:Union
description: Take a deep dive into Danya’s and Brahve’s heat and romance in The Symbiant Re:Union. The events take place after two Endings of The Symbiant’s main game.

name: Carnage Cuisine
description: You are a banana with a gun! Blast your way through hordes of evil cooks and machines in this survivors-like, action rogue-lite. Collect loot, unlock powerful skills, rally your food allies, and lead them to victory! If you fail, upgrade your character and skills, and rise stronger for the next run!

name: Incremental Factory
description: Craft and automate an industrial empire from scratch! Experience a strategic game teeming with challenges as you manage resources, overcome hurdles, and optimize production chains. Are you ready to conquer the challenges of Incremental Factory? Your journey starts here... The Factory Must Grow!

name: Hawaii Detective: Killing of a Krypto King
description: "Hawaii Detective: Killing of a Krypto King" is a Detective Mystery Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim where you play as Detective Laura Ko as she interrogates suspects, investigates clues and follows leads to solve this tropical tale. Maybe she even finds the woman of her dreams along the way too!

name: Skyhood's Innocent Six
description: This game has three scenarios and three raising modes. It's a deckbuilding adventure game.

name: Satanislas
description: Gamble your lives in this fast-paced, hard-as-hell precision platformer, and overcome countless devilish traps across five realms of carefully handcrafted levels. Having trouble? Spend a few souls to gain formidable powers... Or handicap yourself with some curses.

name: 2 Volt
description: Use electric beams to interact with the environment and discover its secrets.

name: Cards Survivors
description: Cards Survivors is a unique mix of card games, action games and roguelikes. Craft a unique deck, slay hordes of enemies, discover cards of immense power and survive as long as you can.

name: Roads of Rome: Portals 2 - Collector's Edition
description: Another adventure of Romans who lost in the mysterious portals while searching the way home.

name: Zong
description: Zong is a first-person VR adventure game that takes you on a journey through ancient Eastern history and culture.

name: Chronique des Silencieux
description: Set in 1970s southern France, you play a rookie private eye tasked to dig out the secrets of a stubborn old man. Think on your feet while you follow your leads : ask questions to witnesses, detect their lies, hypothesize why and finally confront the silent ones running from their past.

name: Dungeon Legends 2
description: Dungeon Legends 2 is an addictive RPG Dungeon Crawler with graphics that will allow you to enter the amazing fictional world of monsters.

name: Outcast Tales
description: Assemble a squad of characters with robust personalities and abilities, and their relationships unfold. Engage in deep tactical battles, make tough decisions , and choose your own adventures - write an Outcast Tale that’s unique to you!

name: Untangle Goats
description: Untangle Goats is a 2D puzzle game based on the action of drag and dropping milk baby bottles. It is set on a farm with a lot a hungry baby goats. You will have to find out the right combinations of various playful patterns, composed of letters, numbers and symbols on those labelled baby bottles, in order to feed all of the baby goats on the farm.

name: Muerto de Risa
description:
Alberto López Felisberto is a normal young man with a problem... Not being able to stop laughing at the most inopportune moments. Today, the event is his grandfather's funeral.

Alberto will have the difficult task of holding back his laughter in the face of the constant absurd situations that his family will present to him. Follow him as he descends into madness in this visual novel about an absurd funeral, mourning a grandfather, and the problem of not being able to laugh in inappropriate situations.

name: Astercys
description: Step into an alternate realm where you traverse through different dimensions, survive spinning battles, and indulge in plenty of pineapple!

name: Secret Kiss with Knight
description:
“Would you dare to betray with me?”

Unexpectedly meeting death during a mission, “I” am confronted by a mysterious “voice”
And so, the “voice” offers “me” a shocking deal.

Can this daring mission and deal be successfully completed?
To survive, I must win both his heart and his body!

name: Pan
description: Make GOD happy and get three coins from your neighbors by using your very limited communication skills of Hitting, Crying, Imitating Micael or Repeating the last thing the person said.

name: Idle Trillionaire
description: Idle Trillionaire is a game about becoming a trillionaire. You are a seemingly normal person, but how will that break your fragile human mind when you are earning billions each second and realize madness is closer than your dreams of a trillion?

name: The Magician Of Justice
description: A personally created numerical RPG mini game，The game is full of exploration and randomness, collecting various abilities such as spirit stones, scrolls, weapons, etc. by finding treasure chests or eliminating monsters, and each battle has a different experience

name: Ninja: Waltz of night
description: "Ninja-Waltz of Night" is a VR action & Roguelike game. Play as a ninja, wield dual blades, clear stages by slaying monsters, and grow stronger. Challenge yourself to see how far you can go!

name: Idle Spiral: Railway Pack
description: You will get the Railway Spiral as a new design.

name: Training Elves
description: You are an adventurer of some renown that has grown tired of adventuring. After losing almost all of your money gambling, you meet two elves that seek you out and put you to task of training them into adventurers. In exchange, they give you amorous nights.

name: Iron Line
description: Iron Line is a tower defense game where you are one of a few, train conductors capable of traversing on the Iron Line. Will you survive the onslaught, or get an express ticket to the afterlife?

name: Puzzle Journey
description: "Puzzle Journey" is the kind of game that captivates you for hours on end. It's perfect for players looking to unwind alone or those wanting to spend quality time with family and friends. Are you ready to take on the challenge? Come and experience "Puzzle Journey" today!

name: Gods Raid
description:
Welcome to Valhalla!

Collect, train, ascend, evolve, and awaken your Heroes to change the fate of the world.
Form the best raiding party by pairing Legendary Heroes and Absolute Gods in pairs.

name: Leaden Sky: Nightmares
description: You are following the story of security guard working at power plant which uses experimental technology, designed to draw electricity from atmosphere. One day you start hearing strange stories about anomaly sightings, soon you witness something terrifying and start experiencing nightmares...

name: Hentai Stars: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Birds of a Feather
description:
"The night shift are bird people?"

You work as a cleaner at an office. Usually, you finish work before the night shift arrive, but this time, you stay a little longer. Now you need to get in and out again without being spotted, or else...

name: Shave N Quit
description: Its your first day on the job at the local hair salon. Just do your best, ok?

name: Muito, Muito Minimalista: FES
description:
The most minimalist platformer ever created, now FES!
Venture into a simple and fun platform game with great challenges! Collect all the coins to unlock the next level!

name: Abstracto
description: Abstracto is a Retro-Inspired, Hack N' Slash, Combat-Oriented Platformer, with a deep combat system that lets you play your way. Play as Forte a blue square on a quest to defeat the evil Immotus and save the strange land of the Abstract.

name: Anji: Implication
description:
Anji: Implication is a horror walking simulator where you just go down the stairs.
The in-game screen has a 16:18 layout, and when you play on the 16:9 screen, a black belt appears on the side, and the game is played in a layout similar to a smartphone.

name: Disappearance: Takeshi. You were right. That Abandoned Village is Too Bad
description: Shissou: Takeshi Omae no Iu Toori datta Ano Haison ha Yaba sugiru is a first-person horror comedy game that explores an abandoned village in Japan to find your lost best friend.

name: Hope with Island
description: Hope and Island is a simulated production game with adventure solving elements, integrating survival, role playing, strategy and other elements.

name: Try if you can 100
description: Defence enemies with a variety of charactersEnemies are coming.Defend your enemies with your own strategic placement

name: Pitch Black
description: Escape Mary-Anne, a doll developed by The MonolIth Corporation, where lessons are learned through play. Stay out of the light, and flip switches to stay in the dark.

name: Jigsaw-Land
description: A relaxing puzzle game with procedurally generated puzzle of different natural biomes.

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Digital Deluxe Edition Content:
• Granblue Fantasy: Relink Game
• Weapon: False Sword of the Apocalypse
• Color Packs 1, 2 and 3
• Starter Item Pack (Glitterstone (S) x30, 500 MSP, Fortitude Crystal (S) x50)
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
• Granblue Special Item Set: Relink Pack (includes "Main Character Outfit: Rebelwear" x1 and "Eternals' Transcendence Set or Evokers' Domain Set" for the Granblue Fantasy mobile/browser game)

Additionally, pre-orders include the following benefits:
• Stamina III and Enmity III Sigils
• Early Access (planned for January 28, 2024)

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Special Edition
description:
Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Special Edition Content:
• Granblue Fantasy: Relink Game
• Weapon: False Sword of the Apocalypse
• Color Packs 2 and 3
• Starter Item Pack (Glitterstone (S) x30, 500 MSP, Fortitude Crystal (S) x50)
• Granblue Special Item Set: Relink Pack* (includes "Main Character Outfit: Rebelwear" x1 and "Eternals' Transcendence Set or Evokers' Domain Set" for the Granblue Fantasy mobile/browser game)
Additionally, pre-orders include the following benefits:
• Stamina III and Enmity III Sigils*
• Early Access* (planned for January 28, 2024)

* Available only for the PS4/PS5 version.

name: Checkers RPG: Online Battles
description: Experience the ultimate fusion of classic online PvP checkers gameplay and RPG elements in Checkers RPG.

name: Hazard Hill Idle
description: Hazard Hill Idle is a small city builder, Buy, Sell and Expand to maintain your population from natural disasters that can strike at any time.

name: Sojourn Through the Decade
description: An autobiographical game focusing on the ten years of creating worlds and its respective characters, with The Sojourner seeing how his stories have fared since then.

name: Clay God
description:
Before you is a set of cards. Every card holds a scene. Every card is a piece of the puzzle. The choice of which ones you flip is yours.

You will experience the scenes of this tale in a random order. By the end, all players will have the same information -- but the journey to them is bound to be different for everyone.

name: Guardian Angel
description: Guardian Angel is a short point-and-click narrative game about finding your way through the world on your own.

name: Lagoon Lounge 2: The Secret Roommate
description: This is a visual novel featuring beastmen. In a lakeside village, the protagonist picks up a mysterious lion beastman and begins to lead a secret life.

name: Rail Rampage
description:
As someone of skill, working in a dangerous but high-level position, it's no wonder why you're up to the task. Unfortunately, we can't always expect luck to be on our side. Fight through a train, prison, and your own employers to finally take back your title of being a 'high value asset'. Features several levels, a built in level editor and player and more.

After all, your skills are worth a lifetime.

name: WooLoop: Science Pack
description: Science GalleryThis Science-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Discover the inner workings of the world around us with this scientific pack!Wrap and weave images of a scientific nature!

name: Sex Simulator: Roman Emperor
description: An interactive SEX SIMULATION game with VISUAL NOVEL elements, featuring HD GRAPHICS and hot ANIMATIONS. Play the role of a young Roman Emperor and relish the privilege of having any woman you desire. Pick between 3 exotic beauties and satisfy them by using a wide selection of sex positions.

name: Cyberpunk Women for Sex Motel
description: Cyberpunk women for Sex motel - additional beautiful customizable female characters ready for having sex in your game

name: Cyberpunk Men for Sex Motel
description: Cyberpunk men for Sex motel - additional customizable handsome undressable male characters with working genitals, and settings to make their bodies even better.

name: Alchemist Quest
description:
Each of the main quests issued by the Alchemists' Fellowship involves different methods of playing the game. Will you brave the dungeon area and all of its turn-based RPG action to bring the fellowship proof of your prowess? Will you elect to go the farming route and grow mythical crops in your garden? Will you gather the resources you need to expand your home beyond what contemporary craftsmanship allows? Or will you spend your time fishing for a legendary lunker?

No two routes play exactly the same, and you can take on whichever you want—or even all of them at once—while also completing optional quests for a variety of townsfolk.

name: Asteroids Neon
description: Asteroids Neon is more than a mere remake—it's a vibrant reimagining of a beloved classic, designed to evoke the neon-soaked dreams of the '80s with a modern twist. Are you ready to embrace the neon nightmares and conquer the celestial chaos? Bedlam awaits, the galaxy will never be the same.

name: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth - Master Vacation Bundle
description:
Add-on for those who have finished Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth.
Use your Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth clear data to play New Game+ in one of three difficulty levels (Normal, Hard, and Legend).

Experience the all-new story of the Big Swell and enjoy special outfits and items available only in this bundle.

Includes:
- New Game+ (Normal, Hard, Legend)
Enjoy the game all over again, carrying over the progress you've made. Please note that some elements, such as substories and bonding events between teammates, will begin anew.

- Bonus Dungeon
Discover the Big Swell of Hawaii in a new episode featuring Kasuga, Kiryu, and the rest of the party. This playable content can be enjoyed after completing the game's main story.

- New Achievements
Acquire challenging new achievements exclusive to the Master Vacation Bundle.

name: Shenanigans
description:
The Evil Dr. Wector has taken the Great Sunflower’s Sun Energy for his evil plan and now it is up to you to get it all back! Join the four hooligans, Simon, Sebrina, Rae, and Beast, in a wacky and goofy 2D adventure!

From the mind of The Escaped Mental Patient, John Coday, explore a world of goofy characters and zany places created by Mythos Makers and Co. Run, Jump, Wall Run, and Swing Your Hammer as you go through beautiful levels and take down enemies along the way. You can run through all the levels or take your time. Take advantage of the smooth and fast paced 2D platforming giving you ultimate control of the adventure! Explore the world or speed through to save it! The choice is yours!

Play as one of four nut cases. The bat wielding madman, Simon. His violent hamer swinging sister, Sebrina. A kind witch named Rae, and her empty headed magical creature, Beast.
